components.ui.bound

Class UIController

  • java.lang.Object
    • components.ui.bound.UIController

  • public class UIController
extends Object
    UIController Controller class to link BusinessComponents that drive each other by variables, e.g. master-detail views

    • Method Detail

      • registerDriver

        public void registerDriver(BusinessComponent bc!,
BBjString var$,
BBjString fieldname$)
        Method registerDriver: Register a business component that acts as a driver and will impact target business components with its current selection
        Parameters:
        BusinessComponent - bc: driving business component
        BBjString - var$: The variable that the business component drives
        BBjString - fieldname$: The fieldname that is reported on its change

      • registerDriver

        public void registerDriver(BusinessComponent bc!,
BBjString var$,
BBjString fieldname$,
BBjNumber fDriveWithFullResult)
        Method registerDriver: Register a business component that acts as a driver and will impact target business components with its current selection
        Parameters:
        BusinessComponent - bc: driving business component
        BBjString - var$: The variable that the business component drives
        BBjString - fieldname$: The fieldname that is reported on its change
        BBjNumber - fDriveWithFullResult: when set to 1, the whole resultset is reported instead of only the selection

      • registerTarget

        public void registerTarget(BusinessComponent bc!,
BBjString var$,
BBjString fieldname$)
        Method registerTarget: Register a business component that will be driven by other driver-business components
        Parameters:
        BusinessComponent - bc: target business component
        BBjString - var$: The variable that drives this business component
        BBjString - fieldname$: the field name driven by the contents of the variable

      • registerTarget

        public void registerTarget(BusinessComponent bc!,
BBjString var$,
BBjString fieldname$,
BBjNumber positionOnFirstRecord)
        Method registerTarget: Register a business component that will be driven by other driver-business components
        Parameters:
        BusinessComponent - bc: target business component
        BBjString - var$: The variable that drives this business component
        BBjString - fieldname$: the field name driven by the contents of the variable
        BBjNumber - positionOnFirstRecord: if set to 1, after driving the first record of the new resultset will be selected

      • unregisterTarget

        public void unregisterTarget(BBjString var$,
BBjString fieldname$)
        Method unregisterTarget: unregister a business component that was driven by other driver-business components
        Parameters:
        BBjString - var$: The variable that drives this business component
        BBjString - fieldname$: the field name driven by the contents of the variable

      • canDrive

        public BBjNumber canDrive(BBjString var$,
BBjVector selection!,
BBjNumber force)
        Method canDrive: Check if a selection change can be finished by asking all registered target business components
        Parameters:
        BBjString - var$: The variable that is about to be changed
        BBjVector - selection!: The new selected value(s) for that component
        BBjNumber - force: notify the other components of a mandatory selection change with no option to veto
        Returns:
        BBjNumber canDrive: 0 = change of selection denied, 1 = change of selection allowed

      • drive

        public void drive(BBjString var$,
BBjVector selection!)
        Method drive: broadcast a selection change to the concerned target business components
        Parameters:
        BBjString - var$: The variable that has changed
        BBjVector - selection!: The new selected value(s) for that component
